Actions.Name: A Hundred Maws
Actions.Effects: Characters inside its space take 2 damage.

Actions.Name: Swarm Surge
Actions.Description: The Swarm dashes 2, ignoring all movement penalties.

Actions.Name: Consume
Actions.Description: A foe inside the swarm's area is marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked, they are dazed+ and winded+ while sharing space with the swarm and take [D]+[fray] for ending their turn inside it instead of just [fray] damage.
